title: Check for Value of Square Root Function
text: The square root functions only take positive $$y$$ value. In other word, $$\sqrt{x}=y$$ is defined when $$y$$ is non negative real number.
speech: The square root functions only take positive  y  value. In other word,  the square root of x is equal to y  is defined when  y  is non negative real number.

value. In other word,   the square root of x is equal to y

title: Check for Value of Square Root Function
text: $$\sqrt{3y-4}=-2$$ does not have solution since $$-2$$ is negative.
speech: the square root of 3 y minus 4 end root is equal to, negative 2  does not have solution since  negative 2  is negative.
